title: The Girl who met Simone de Beauvoir
creator_credit: Richard Brennan, AFTRS, Television and Radio School and Richard Wherrett
brief_description: Adapted from a short story by Frank Moorhouse, this is a lighthearted presentation of a man’s difficulty in coping with women’s liberation and the new position of some women in society.
